Name: Emerald Enclave Scout
Traits: Dwarven Resilience. The scout has advantage on saving throws against poison. Keen Hearing and Sight. The scout has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.
Actions: Multiattack. The scout makes two melee attacks. War Pick. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage. Heavy Crossbow. Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d10) piercing damage.
